body.p:
Milton Ky May 2nd 1862
To his Honor --
The Governor of Kentucky

We the undersigned your petitioners respectfully ask the appointment of a Justice of the peace in this Milton District Trimble County Ky to serve fill the vacancy occasioned by the resignation of J. M. Abbott resigned Esqr and recommend the appointment of Sanford B. Kindle

Verry Respectfully &c
John Hallstein
John W Barringer
O F Barringer
W. A Moreland
D J Vautor
N. Simon
John Luy^s^
John Mercer
Madison Barriger
G. W. Barriger
John moses
Dudley Barriger
John Nickles

Trimble Co.
J. P.
Dist No. 7.
S. B. Kindle
Iss May 7. 1862
